title: Share Your Feedback
description: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts on governance, ethics, safety, user experience, or reporting issues. Your feedback directly informs our continuous improvement process.
messagePlaceholder: Describe your feedback in detail. Be specific about what you observed, why it matters, and any suggestions you have...
privacyNotice: Your feedback is stored internally and never published publicly. If you provide an email address, it will be hashed for privacy. All feedback is reviewed by our governance team.
trustOptIn: Help us improve by contributing to our Trust Index (your feedback will be scored to calibrate quality signals)
successMessage: Your feedback has been received successfully.
trustScore: Your feedback received a trust score of {score}/1.00
trustIndicator: Your input helps calibrate our Trust Index and improves governance decisions.
nextSteps: Your feedback will be reviewed in the next governance cycle. For urgent matters, please contact
errorRetry: Please try again or contact us directly if the problem persists.
rateLimitError: Too many requests. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
validationError: Please check your input and ensure all required fields are complete.
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
serverError: Server error. Our team has been notified. Please try again later.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
messageTooShort: Message must be at least 1 character
emailRequired: Email is required when you opt in for follow-up
